Articles.Content:
hey guys, I'm building a space station in KSP, and it's fine, 400km high, and everytime I try to spawn a solar array on the pad the station simply disappears, I'm using a few mods I don't know if that has anything to do with it

edit: it apparently shows up on the tracking station but I can't see it when I spawn the array in

Edited February 25 by kamikewl

I am unfamiliar with this issue but if you list the mods you're using someone else might recognize it. Good luck. 

And thread moved to Support.
